definition[0]: the activity of collecting money for a specific purpose, especially in order to help people who are ill, old etc
example[0]: an Action Pack full of fundraising ideas
definition[1]: the activity of obtaining money for political parties, CHARITIES etc
example[1]: The rules of campaign fundraising are brutally simple: money follows a winner.
example[2]: The Bishop of Birmingham has launched a fundraising drive for the cathedral.
definition[2]: the activity of obtaining money for investment
example[3]: The rating agencyâ€™s downgrading will probably have only minimal effects on the fundraising abilities of the bank.
